protein.general_function: Involved in negative regulation of cell proliferation

reference.reference_text: Nagpal S, Patel S, Asano AT, Johnson AT, Duvic M, Chandraratna RA: Tazarotene-induced gene 1 (TIG1), a novel retinoic acid receptor-responsive gene in skin. J Invest Dermatol. 1996 Feb;106(2):269-74.
